subject: RE: Virtual meeting with Flock
body:
Hi Caroline,

 

Thanks for taking my call and your flexibility on the timing. We will plan on keeping the Thursday 3/13 meeting time in place. We look forward to speaking with you then.


Best,

 

Tim Costin

Sr. Financial Analyst

Eugene Police Department

300 Country Club Road

Eugene, Oregon 97401

Office: (541) 682-8364

Cell: (541) 844-9015

 



 

From: Caroline Fraher <caroline.fraher@flocksafety.com> 
Sent: Thursday, March 6, 2025 1:53 PM
To: COSTIN Timothy M <TCostin@eugene-or.gov>
Cc: BURKE Jacob T <JBurke@eugene-or.gov>; CHOTERUNGRUANGKORN Nikki <NChoterungruangkorn@eugene-or.gov>
Subject: Re: Virtual meeting with Flock

 

[EXTERNAL ?]

Hi Tim,

 

Is there any chance your team could meet on Wednesday instead of Thursday?

	
 

Caroline Fraher
Account Executive



 https://www.instagram.com/flocksafety/ 
 <https://cdn.gifo.wisestamp.com/s/rfm1/108062/26/trans.png>  1-310-844-3659 call/text <tel:310-844-3659call/text>    <https://cdn.gifo.wisestamp.com/s/rfw4/108062/26/trans.png>  flocksafety.com 

 <https://cdn.gifo.wisestamp.com/s/rfcustom/108062/26/trans.png>  caroline.fraher@flocksafety.com caroline.fraher@flocksafety.com 

	
 

	
 

 <https://tracy.srv.wisestamp.com/px/wsid/1XrlOmpdrQPY.png> 

 

 

On Thu, Mar 6, 2025 at 1:26?PM Caroline Fraher <caroline.fraher@flocksafety.com caroline.fraher@flocksafety.com > wrote:

	Yes, I will send the invite and leave it open so you can add your city attorney to it. Thank you for the quick reply! 

	
 

Caroline Fraher
Account Executive



 https://www.instagram.com/flocksafety/ 
 <https://cdn.gifo.wisestamp.com/s/rfm1/108062/26/trans.png>  1-310-844-3659 call/text <tel:310-844-3659call/text>    <https://cdn.gifo.wisestamp.com/s/rfw4/108062/26/trans.png>  flocksafety.com 

 <https://cdn.gifo.wisestamp.com/s/rfcustom/108062/26/trans.png>  caroline.fraher@flocksafety.com caroline.fraher@flocksafety.com 

	
 

	
 

	 <https://tracy.srv.wisestamp.com/px/wsid/1XrlOmpdrQPY.png> 

	 

	 

	On Thu, Mar 6, 2025 at 1:24?PM COSTIN Timothy M <TCostin@eugene-or.gov TCostin@eugene-or.gov > wrote:

		Hello Caroline,

		 

		Can Flock�s legal team meet Thursday 3/13/25 in the afternoon around 2:30 PST virtually? I have connected with our City attorney and it sounds like that timeline works well. 

		 

		Best,

		 

		Tim Costin

		Sr. Financial Analyst

		Eugene Police Department

		300 Country Club Road

		Eugene, Oregon 97401

		Office: (541) 682-8364

		Cell: (541) 844-9015



		From: BURKE Jacob T <JBurke@eugene-or.gov JBurke@eugene-or.gov > 
		Sent: Thursday, March 6, 2025 12:44 PM
		To: Caroline Fraher <caroline.fraher@flocksafety.com caroline.fraher@flocksafety.com >; COSTIN Timothy M <TCostin@eugene-or.gov TCostin@eugene-or.gov >
		Cc: CHOTERUNGRUANGKORN Nikki <NChoterungruangkorn@eugene-or.gov NChoterungruangkorn@eugene-or.gov >
		Subject: Virtual meeting with Flock

		 

		Tim, 

		 

		Can we try to arrange a virtual meeting between our legal teams and Caroline and myself for next week?  This would be to discuss any issues and hopefully finalize the contract.   Earlier in the week is preferred.  Here are some days and times that may work.  Please let me know and we can set up a calendar invite.  

		 

		Tuesday- After 11

		Wednesday-  8-9, 11am, or anytime after 12pm

		Thursday-  Anytime except 1p-2p.  

		 

		Thank you 

		 

		 

		Jake Burke

		Captain � Investigations Division

		Eugene Police Department

		300 Country Club Road

		Eugene, Oregon 97401

		(541) 682-5895 work
